main.subtitle: Software Engineer
main.description: I love learning new things and am passionate about technology and creative solutions to solve real world problems.

services.title: SERVICES
services.subtitle: Services I offer
services.frontEndDescription: Building responsive React websites with Node.js for backends, prioritizing SEO, accessibility, and a smooth user experience. I can also leverage Rust's performance for demanding applications.
services.backEndDescription: Building performant backends with Rust & TypeScript, leveraging NoSQL for data and exposing a well-defined RESTful API, ensuring a seamless developer experience.
services.UIDesignDescription: Build a web3 DApp using Ethereum's EVM and Solana, focusing on leveraging both platforms' capabilities to create a robust decentralized application.
services.IoTSolutionsDescription: Build apps with React Native and Kotlin for strong features, simplifying development with Figma's user-friendly design tools.
services.acousticalEngDescription: I build unique, memorable logo identities tailored to resonate with your audience. With tools like Figma, I ensure attention to detail and creativity, leaving a lasting impression for your brand.
services.othersDescription: Let me know more about your problem, I am open to new approaches to develop new solutions.

otoh.title: GenreGenius
otoh.description1: Genregenius is a Python-based movie recommendation system hosted on GitHub. It utilizes pandas, scikit-learn, and NumPy for data processing and machine learning.
otoh.description2: With an interactive web interface powered by Streamlit, it offers personalized movie suggestions tailored to user genre preferences.

award.title: Key Highlights
award.award1: Unlock the power of Genregenius as it curates a tailored list of 10 movies spanning various genres.
award.award2: Transform your browsing experience with the Genregenius Chrome extension with live recommendations

otoh.title: Nova-ResumeAI
otoh.description1: Nova-AI Resume utilizes Gensim NLP to generate tailored questions from resumes, while also pinpointing errors and providing personalized suggestions, streamlining the resume refinement process with efficiency and precision.
otoh.description2: With Django for the backend, and frontends using React.js, it ensures seamless user interaction, while deployment via Docker and github.

award.title: Key Highlights
award.award1: NovAI Resume offers personalized question generation, tailored to individual resumes, with up to 30 insightful questions and sample answers
award.award2: NovAI Resume with multi-language support ensures inclusivity for non-native English speakers, while integrating a job recommender system offers personalized job recommendations aligned with users' skills and career goals.

otoh.title: MELA
otoh.description1: MLEA , a Multi-Language Emergency Assistant, breaks down language barriers during medical crises with its web and app solutions built on React and React Native ,leveraging PostgreSQL for backend stability.
otoh.description2: It translates user issues into doctor-specific languages in real time using Hugging Face's MarianMT, ensuring prompt and accurate medical assistance.

award.title: Key Highlights
award.award1: MLEA eliminates language barriers in medical emergencies through real-time translation, ensuring effective communication between users and medical professionals regardless of language proficiency.
award.award2: Expanding MLEA into a fully functional mobile application and deploying it on Google Play with multi-language support.

otoh.title: Shop-''less''-AI
otoh.description1: Hyper-personalized product recommendation system by Geni AI and AllenNLP, delivering tailored suggestions based on user prompts.
otoh.description2: Faster shopping with delivering precise recommendations across various categories on products, reducing shopping time.

award.title: Key Highlights
award.award1: Ensuring cost-effectiveness by comparing prices of the same product across various websites, helping users find the best deals.
award.award2: Exapnding our Shop-''less''-AI by hosting it on our personal domain and making it public amplifies user engagement and market presence, offering customized experiences
